alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 2:35AM CDT until June 02 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Arkansas River at Derby affecting Sedgwick County. Arkansas River near Mulvane affecting Sedgwick and Sumner Counties. Arkansas River at Oxford affecting Sumner County. Arkansas River at Arkansas City affecting Cowley County. For the Arkansas River...including Great Bend, Hutchinson, Haven, Derby, Mulvane, Oxford, Arkansas City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River near Mulvane. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, Flood waters begin to impact the River Vista subdivision at 111th South Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 17.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Arkansas River Mulvane 16.5 15.6 Wed 2 am CDT 15.3 10.1 7.7 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
